/usr/bin/cc  -fPIC    -shared -Wl,-soname,libubertooth.so.1 -o libubertooth.so.1.0 CMakeFiles/ubertooth.dir/ubertooth.c.o CMakeFiles/ubertooth.dir/ubertooth_callback.c.o CMakeFiles/ubertooth.dir/ubertooth_control.c.o CMakeFiles/ubertooth.dir/ubertooth_fifo.c.o -lusb-1.0 /usr/local/lib/libbtbb.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
